name: 布罗迪·贝特
birth_place: 美国，北卡罗来纳州，格林斯伯勒
introduction: Brody is an actor, musician and voice over artist. He is the singing voice for Gil on Nickelodeon's Bubble Guppies as of the 2021 season. He is known for his two Broadway National Tours Finding Neverland (Michael) and Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (Charlie). He does various voiceover work for Disney and Nickelodeon. He played Young Solomon in the movie Tethered. He plays 5 instruments, piano, organ, guitar, ukulele and drums.
